text: Nde maaŋ muuŋgip mbe shama then muuŋv nden kamgirim, nde ŋgɨp, nde mba zɨ guarara mba zɨ ki fhuv gumgi piigi mpirmpirɨgir pigiri. Mba shama mbuav nden kamgi guma bigɨn ma. Ana nduara zɨv nde gangip, khaŋ ndu suanga, ‘Kɨvntok, ndu khavgip, naaŋ ŋgɨp mbu mpirmpirɨga vhuun pera.’ Ana maaŋ ndu suaŋrim, ndu naaŋ ŋgɨp mba mpirmpirɨga perarim, ndu phorga mba shaman vegi gumgi, mbe ndu gangip, khaŋ ndu suanga, ‘Ndu zɨ ki guma ma.’
